root.TargetConnectionString: Data Source = PC201506031349;Initial Catalog = CLZ;Integrated Security = SSPI;
root.SelectQuery: SELECT id,token,wechat_id,pt_user_name,m_id,binding_state,FROM_UNIXTIME(binding_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as binding_date,FROM_UNIXTIME(unbinding_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as unbinding_date FROM wx_wechat_other_platform_binding;
